turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good afternoon, I was looking to place a pickup order from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking to get four pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what toppings would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was hoping to get mushrooms, pepperoni, and sausage, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you have any crust preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Could I get thick crust, please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll do it for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me confirm that. 4 medium pizzas, mushroom, pepperoni and sausage, thick crust. did i get that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bella luna's in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. I'm looking forward to it.
